x,y=map(int,raw_input().split())
if(x == 0 and y==0):
    c=False
else:
    c=True

while(c):
    fib=[]
    p=0
    r=1
    while(1):

        n=p+r
        if(n<=y):
            fib.append(n)
        else:
            break
        p=r
        r=n
    fib.append(x)
    fib.append(y)
    fib.sort()
    ix=fib.index(x)
    iy=fib.index(y)

    fib=fib[ix:iy]
    lfib=len(fib)
    output=lfib-1
    print output

    x,y=map(int, raw_input().split())
    if(x==0 and y==0):
        c=False
    else:
        c=True
